completed_projects.completion_summary: Fixed 3 confirmed bugs in himalaya email plugin: added defensive nil check in move command format_item function, converted search keymaps from incorrect nvim_buf_set_keymap API to proper vim.keymap.set, and fixed compose send keymap to call correct send_email(buf) function.

Added error logging for async email fetch, implemented page preloading for faster navigation, and enhanced ? key notification with specific action key examples (<leader>med, <leader>mea, <leader>mer).

completed_projects.completion_summary: Fixed 4 Himalaya post-task-59 issues: string format error for 1000+ folder counts, aggressive page preloading (50-100ms delays) for instant C-d/C-u pagination, show_help function for sidebar/compose contexts, and improved help messaging emphasizing <leader>me prefix for email actions.

artifacts.summary: Identified 6 delay sources in pagination flow including missing cache hit path, full UI refresh, and preload timing issues

completed_projects.completion_summary: Implemented page-level cache with synchronous lookup for instant pagination. Added pre-rendered display lines for < 16ms cache hit path, optimistic UI updates with silent background refresh, and generation-based staleness detection.
